'''Twirling Lotus''' is a [[Character Event Wish-2]] in [[Version 3.6]].

==Wish Details==
===Duration===
* 2023-04-12 11:00:00 UTC+8 &ndash; 2023-05-02 17:59:59

===Summary===
* In this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Dance of Lotuslight" [[Nilou]] ({{Hydro}}) will get a huge drop-rate boost!
* During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Mender of Tribulations" [[Kuki Shinobu]] ({{Electro}}), "Treasure of Dream Garden" [[Dori]] ({{Electro}}), and "Fantastical Evening Star" [[Layla]] ({{Cryo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!
* Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."
* For information about rates, see [[Wish]]es.
